page.title: 19LAW AND ORDER
page.content: The biggest area of crime in Harlow is theft,mostly of electrical goods including videos,computers e.t.c.Last year there was more motor vehicle theft so the chief constable of Essex told the chief superintendent of Harlow to get a group of police officers to concentrate on car theft. Then the numbers of car thefts went down.Shoplifting is also big in Harlow. Harlow has a policy of neighbourhood policing.The reason for this is so that a police constable can get to know people.They tell them if they are committing a minor offence like parking their car on the pavement,or warn people if they are about to commit an offence. Harlow has its own Magistrates Court.
